publicationStmt.publisher: Wellcome Library; Bibliotheca Alexandrina; King's College London

msContents.summary: 1 untitled text on dream interpretation, anonymously written

msItem.title: Text on dream interpretation
msItem.incipit: f.1v.3 وفقنا الله وايّاك اعلم انّ علم التعبير من العلوم العظيم الجليلة
msItem.explicit: f.26v.19 وذكر او شرفا مع ذكر فَانْ رَاى انّ ذكره دخل فى جوفه فانّه
msItem.note: The work is preceded by a table of contents, which begins at Chapter 10.

supportDesc.foliation: European foliation in pencil; catchwords present.

p.material: Paper binding (possibly an exercise book) with blue paper covers.

revisionDesc.change: Updated record in accordance with Fihrist standards.
